trans-unit.source: Defines the behavior of a service that acts as a container of types.

<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ITypeProvider> can be pushed as a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> service to discover data types that are necessary for extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) workflow activation.
Gets the <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the named entity.
A string that contains the name of the entity.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the named entity.
Gets the <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the named entity.
A string that contains the name of the entity.
A value that indicates whether to throw an exception if name is not resolvable.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the named entity.
Creates and returns an array which contains each <xref href="System.Type"></xref> known to this instance.
An array which contains each <xref href="System.Type"></xref> known to this instance.
Temporary assembly that is generated during the compilation process to validate the types in the active project that is being compiled.
The local <xref href="System.Reflection.Assembly"></xref> defined by this instance.
Gets a collection of all assemblies referenced by the <xref href="System.Type"></xref>.
A collection of all assemblies referenced by the <xref href="System.Type"></xref>.
Gets an <xref href="System.Collections.IDictionary"></xref> of load error exceptions keyed by the <xref href="System.Object"></xref> causing the <xref href="System.Exception"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IDictionary"></xref> of load error exceptions keyed by the <xref href="System.Object"></xref> causing the <xref href="System.Exception"></xref>.
Occurs when the collection <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.TypeProvider.TypeLoadErrors"></xref> is modified.
Occurs when the types in the type provider that implements this interface change.
This can happen when an assembly or <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> is added or removed from the type provider.
